article_title: San Luis principal honored by the state
article_text:

og.description: SAN LUIS, Ariz. – On one of his first days as principal of San Luis Middle School in 2009, Rafael Sanchez watched about 40 students arrive late to class without facing consequences or even being questioned about the reasons for their tardiness.
